http://www.imdb.com/title/tt0929858/
Thank you. Impressive dvdrip quality, especially since this film still is marked as being "in production" on imdb.
Aspect is wrong though, too much widescreen stretched out horizontally.
Wondering if this has the same problem as loder release. Second disk was bad. Anyone that has check this please leave comment.
Well checked it myself se3cond part is the same as loders. Second disk pixils then sound out of sync for rest of movie. NUKE it.
Can anybody fix this, it's a good movie to keep except for the sound problem...
